title: Windows 10 gets new Search Highlights feature for Release Preview Insiders
content:
Microsoft has begun rolling out the new Search Highlights experience to Windows Insiders running Windows 10 in the Release Preview channel. This feature was first announced alongside Windows 11 build 22572 last week, but Microsoft made it clear right away that it would be coming to Windows 10 as well. The feature is arriving along

The post Windows 10 gets new Search Highlights feature for Release Preview Insiders appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft has begun rolling out the new Search Highlights feature to Insiders running Windows 10 in the Release Preview channel.
